welcome.top: Bass Station wishes you all a
ticker: Return (from the beyond) every Saturday night for (mostly) living DJs!
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!

event.top: It's too late now, you're at the
ticker: Don't pass on too soon~! Stick around till late for a special LIVE performance by our fearless leader V(AI)RUS at ACFI!
Don't become a desiccated husk just yet, remember to hydrate often~!
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!

performers.name: Jay Cee Beats
ticker: Let's wake the dead and start off with some Tech House!
Follow Jaycee at https://www.youtube.com/@Jayceebeatsmusic1988

performers.name: Wrath
ticker: Demonic devilish Dubstep now departing!
Follow Wrath at https://www.youtube.com/@DJ_Wrath46

performers.name: Ovtlvndish
ticker: Don't go in to the light, stay dancing under ours with some UK Bass/Speed House!
Follow me at https://twitter.com/Outland1shVR

performers.name: Japhet
ticker: Our resident skull DJ rises to bring us back to some Mainstage~
'Remember to be the change you want to see'
Follow Japhet at https://twitter.com/MSGspike

performers.name: V[AI]RUS - LIVE FROM ACFI!
ticker: V[AI]RUS escaped to Alamo City Furry Invasion! We've gone live to their on stage performance!
Follow V[AI]RUS at https://twitter.com/v_ai_rus

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. Goodnight out there..... whatever you are~
See you all next week!
Please note that the glowing ectoplasm is a known carcinogen in the State of California.
Some services may be delayed due to ~Late~ passengers.
